education_text.0: Silvio Micali (born October 13, 1954) is an      Italian      Computer scientist computer scientist,      professor at the      Massachusetts Institute of Technology Massachusetts Institute of Technology and the founder of   Micali graduated in mathematics at      redirect    La Sapienza University of Rome La Sapienza University of Rome in 1978 and earned a      redirect    PhD degree in computer science from the      University of California, Berkeley University of California, Berkeley in 1982
